text: The arrondissement of Arcachon is an arrondissement of France. It is part of the Gironde département. Its capital is the city of Arcachon. ==History== The arrondissement of Arcachon was created on 6 December 2006, to begin on 1 January 2007, with four cantons taken from the arrondissement of Bordeaux. ==Geography== The arrondissement of Arcachon is in southwestern Gironde, with an area of . It has 146,160 inhabitants and a population density of inhabitants/km². The arrondissement is bordered to the north by the arrondissement of Lesparre-Médoc, to the northeast by the arrondissement of Bordeaux, to the southeast by the arrondissement of Langon, to the south by the Landes department and to the west by the Atlantic Ocean (Gulf of Biscay). ==Composition== ===Cantons=== After the reorganisation of the cantons in France, cantons are not subdivisions of the arrondissements so they could have communes that belong to different arrondissements. In the arrondissement of Arcachon, there is only one canton where not all their "communes" are in the arrondissement: Les Landes des Graves. The following table shows the distribution of the "communes" in the cantons and arrondissements: Cantons and communes in the arrondissement of Arcachon INSEE Code Canton Arrondissements Total Blaye Bordeaux Langon Lesparre-Médoc Libourne Arcachon 3301 Andernos-les-Bains 6 6 3314 Gujan-Mestras 4 4 3315 Les Landes des Graves 20 5 25 3332 La Teste-de-Buch 2 2 ===Communes=== The arrondissement of Arcachon has 17 communes; they are (with their INSEE codes): # Andernos-les-Bains (33005) # Arcachon (33009) # Arès (33011) # Audenge (33019) # Le Barp (33029) # Belin-Béliet (33042) # Biganos (33051) # Gujan- Mestras (33199) # Lanton (33229) # Lège-Cap-Ferret (33236) # Lugos (33260) # Marcheprime (33555) # Mios (33284) # Saint-Magne (33436) # Salles (33498) # Le Teich (33527) # La Teste-de-Buch (33529) The communes in the arrondissement with more inhabitants are: INSEE code Commune Population (2014) Canton Intercommunality 33529 La Teste-de-Buch 25,990 La Teste-de-Buch Communauté d'agglomération Bassin d'Arcachon Sud-Pôle Atlantique 33199 Gujan- Mestras 20,575 Gujan-Mestras Communauté d'agglomération Bassin d'Arcachon Sud- Pôle Atlantique 33005 Andernos-les-Bains 11,712 Andernos-les-Bains Le Bassin d'Arcachon Nord Atlantique 33009 Arcachon 10,370 La Teste-de-Buch Communauté d'agglomération Bassin d'Arcachon Sud-Pôle Atlantique 33051 Biganos 10,017 Andernos-les-Bains Le Bassin d'Arcachon Nord Atlantique 33284 Mios 8,659 Gujan-Mestras Le Bassin d'Arcachon Nord Atlantique 33236 Lège-Cap-Ferret 8,087 Andernos-les-Bains Le Bassin d'Arcachon Nord Atlantique 33527 Le Teich 7,418 Gujan-Mestras Communauté d'agglomération Bassin d'Arcachon Sud-Pôle Atlantique 33019 Audenge 7,177 Andernos-les-Bains Le Bassin d'Arcachon Nord Atlantique ==Related pages== * Arrondissements of the Gironde department * Communes of the Gironde department ==References== Arcachon
